body: It shouldn't be auto PR => Gerrit. That is far too much to expect. I think PR => Issue generation (as a link in the auto bot reply) as an option instead of creating something in Gerrit would be more compliant with your working/operating standards and (hopefully) a lot easier. It would also come across as a *softer* response, rather than a flat-out dismissal. Kinda like a friendly chi redirection ;-)
